titleStmt.title: Paraphrase vpon the seaven pen[i]tentiall psalmes of [t]he kingly prophet tra[n]slated out of Italian by I.H.
Sette Salmi della penitentia di David. English. 1635
titleStmt.author: Aretino, Pietro, 1492-1556.
Hawkins, John, fl. 1635.

notesStmt.note: Translation of Pietro Aretino's "I sette Salmi della penitentia di David"--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication and publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
